amendment.description: Amendment sought to ensure that high poverty schools are not adversely affected by the provisions of H.R. 5 with respect to teacher support and the quality of educational services.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 114-29 to delay implementation of new Title II formula until the Secretary of Education determines that the implementation will not reduce funding for schools serving high percentages of students in poverty.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 239 (Roll no. 99).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Moore amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 239 (Roll no. 99).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Moore.
